Texts.Chs: 如果把它挂在一个带有门和灯的封闭建筑里，人们就会搬进去，把这里当做自己的家。
Texts.Eng: If hung in an enclosed building with a door and a light, someone will move in and make it their home.

Texts.Chs: 如果把它放在带有门和灯的房子里，人们就会有动力搬进来。
Texts.Eng: If placed in a building with a door and a light it will encourage someone to move in.

Texts.Chs: 如果被安置在一个结构正确的建筑里，这个殖民地契约就会鼓励其他人搬进来。
Texts.Eng: If placed in a correctly structured building, this colony deed will encourage someone to move in.

Texts.Chs: 放置在一个至少有着一扇门和光源的封闭建筑中，然后看着人们搬进来吧！
Texts.Eng: Place in an enclosed building with at least one door and light source and someone will move in!

Texts.Chs: 把它挂挂挂在建筑物的墙壁上，让这里成为某某人的新家！
Texts.Eng: Ssscreen to hang on building wall. Makes sssomeone move into home!

Texts.Chs: 这些东西对扩大殖民地很有帮助。把它放在带有门和灯的建筑里，人们就会搬进来。
Texts.Eng: These are great for expanding a colony. Place it in a building with a door and a light and someone will move in.

Texts.Chs: 这个装置会邀请人们入住这座建筑，只要确保有一扇门和一盏灯。
Texts.Eng: This device will invite someone to move into the building. Just make sure there's a door and a light.

Texts.Chs: 有了殖民地契约，人们就会搬进这座建筑，只要确保这座建筑带有门和光源就可以了。
Texts.Eng: With a colony deed someone'll move into the building. Just make sure the building has a door an' a light source.
